title: Roni Back: Suomen Suurinta Piilosta
overview: Roni Back: Finland's Greatest Hide and Seek is a six-part series that brings the highly popular hide-and-seek games of favorite YouTuber Roni Back from YouTube to Ruutuu! In the series, Roni and his guests - both other well-known YouTubers and TV celebrities - compete against each other in a game of hide-and-seek in the most special places around Finland. Each episode offers unexpected twists and surprises that keep both the seeker and the hiders in suspense and take hide-and-seek to a whole new level!
